properties.name: columns
properties.description: Columns - defines an array of grid columns. Can be column or grouped column.

properties.name: frameSize
properties.description: Defines how many rows/columns should be rendered outside visible area.

properties.name: pinnedBottomSource
properties.description: Pinned bottom Source: {[T in ColumnProp]: any} - defines pinned bottom rows data source.

properties.name: pinnedTopSource
properties.description: Pinned top Source: {[T in ColumnProp]: any} - defines pinned top rows data source.

properties.name: range
properties.description: When true, user can range selection.

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: When true, grid in read only mode.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source: {[T in ColumnProp]: any} - defines main data source. Can be an Object or 2 dimensional array([][]); ColumnProp - string|number. It is reference for column mapping.
